animals.name: Jungle Fowl
animals.description: Cloaked in the emerald embrace of Southeast Asian rainforests, jungle fowl strut a vibrant dance of life. Dazzling roosters, adorned with fiery combs and wattles.

animals.name: Deer
animals.description: Deer are elegant and graceful mammals belonging to the family Cervidae, which includes a variety of species such as white-tailed deer, mule deer, elk, and moose.

animals.name: King-fisher
animals.description: Kingfishers are a fascinating family of birds known for their vibrant colors, distinctive appearance, and remarkable hunting skills.

animals.name: Blue Bird
animals.description: Bluebirds, with their enchanting azure plumage and gentle demeanor, are a captivating group of birds that belong to the thrush family, Turdidae.

animals.name: Elephant
animals.description: Elephants, revered for their immense size, intelligence, and social complexity, are iconic mammals belonging to the family Elephantidae.

animals.name: King Vulture
animals.description: The King Vulture possesses a predominantly white plumage with contrasting black flight feathers and tail, while its head and neck are adorned with vivid hues of orange, red, and yellow.

nationalParks.name: Yala National Park
nationalParks.description: This sprawling park in the south is famous for its diverse wildlife, including leopards, elephants, and crocodiles. Guided safaris offer excellent opportunities to observe these creatures in their natural habitat.
nationalParks.link: Learn more about Wilpattu National Park

nationalParks.name: Wilpattu National Park
nationalParks.description: Located in the northwest, Wilpattu boasts one of the highest leopard densities in the world. Explore its vast dry season tanks and dense forests on a jeep safari to catch a glimpse of these elusive predators.
nationalParks.link: Learn more about Yala National Park
